alert.note: Alert for Adams; Allen; Huntington; Wabash; Wells; Whitley (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 12:41PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Allen, southeastern Wabash, southeastern Whitley, Huntington, Wells and northwestern Adams Counties through 115 PM EDT... At 1241 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Huntington, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fort Wayne and New Haven. This includes the following highways... Interstate 469 between mile markers 0 and 12. Interstate 69 in Indiana between mile markers 272 and 305. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 PM EDT for central, north central and northeastern Indiana.

area.areaDesc: Adams; Allen; Huntington; Wabash; Wells; Whitley
